Detailed Description

Basic class for defining feed-forward neural networks.

This class defines feedforward neural networks based on the functions defined in Ops_basic.h and FFManip.h.

Member Function Documentation

Individual FFOps_Basic_neu::createEmpty (  const unsigned    nIn,
const unsigned    nHidden,
const unsigned    nOut
) 
 

This function creats a generic neural network.

The neural network is generated given the number of input, output and hidhen nodes.

Parameters:
nIn:  number of input nodes
nHidden:  number of hidden nodes
nOut:  number of output nodes.

Array<double> FFOps_Basic_neu::getActivation (  Individual &    Ind ) 
 

This function returns the activation values of a network.

Parameters:
Ind:  Individual representing the network to be accessed

Array<int> FFOps_Basic_neu::getConnectionsReClaM (  Individual &    Ind ) 
 

This function returns the connection matrix of the neural network.

Notice that connections between the bias nodes are provided separately in column at the end of the matrix.

Parameters:
Ind:  Individual variable that defines the structure and parameters of the neural network.

Array<int> FFOps_Basic_neu::getConnectionsWithoutBias (  Individual &    Ind ) 
 

This function also returns connection matrix of the neural network.

However, the connection of the bias nodes are not included.

Parameters:
Ind:  Individual variable that defines the structure and parameters of the neural network.

Array<double> FFOps_Basic_neu::getGain (  Individual &    Ind ) 
 

This function calculates the output of all neurons in the network.

Parameters:
Ind:  The network to be calculated defined by an individual

Array<double> FFOps_Basic_neu::getWeightsReClaM (  Individual &    Ind ) 
 

This function returns the weigh value of the connections.

The weights connecting the bias nodes are listed in column at the end of the matrix.

Parameters:
Ind:  Individual variable that defines the structure and parameters of the neural network.

void FFOps_Basic_neu::printNet (  Individual &    Ind,
string    filename
) 
 

Print out the connections as well as the weights of the network.

The data are printed out to a file whose name is supplied by filename.

Parameters:
Ind:  The network to be printed out, which is represented by an individual.
filename:  name of the file to store the connections and weights of the network.

Reimplemented from Ops_Basic.

void FFOps_Basic_neu::printNetWithoutBias (  Individual &    Ind,
string    filename
) 
 

Print out the connections as well as the weights of the network.

The data are printed out to a file whose name is supplied by filename. However, the biases are not included.

Parameters:
Ind:  The network to be printed out, which is represented by an individual.
filename:  name of the file to store the connections and weights of the network.

void FFOps_Basic_neu::setActivation (  Individual &    Ind,
Array< double >    activation
) 
 

Set the activation value.

Parameters:
Ind:  Individual representing the network
activation:  a matrix that contains the activation values

void FFOps_Basic_neu::setConnectionsReClaM (  Individual &    Ind,
Array< int >    cR
) 
 

This function defines the connections (structure) of a neural network.

The network structure is defined by the connection matrix.

Parameters:
Ind:  an individual representing a neural network
cR:  the connection matrix

void FFOps_Basic_neu::setWeightsReClaM (  Individual &    Ind,
Array< double >    cW
) 
 

This function defines the weights of a neural network.

The network weights are given the connection matrix.

Parameters:
Ind:  an individual representing a neural network
cW:  the weight matrix
